# attn.markets docs

> Documentation for attnCredit (revenue-swept revolving credit for onchain businesses) and attnUSD (LP exposure to managed credit pools). Use these pages for product concepts, mechanics, controls, risk policy, pricing parameters, tokenomics, and roadmap.

These docs describe product mechanics and policy. They are not legal, tax, or investment advice.

## Start here
- [Overview](https://docs.attn.markets/): entrypoint and navigation
- [attn 1-pager](https://docs.attn.markets/1-pager): concise product overview
- [The missing layer for onchain revenues](https://docs.attn.markets/introduction/the-missing-layer-for-onchain-revenues)
- [Banking the internet of revenue](https://docs.attn.markets/introduction/banking-the-internet-of-revenue)
- [How attnCredit works (non-technical)](https://docs.attn.markets/mechanics/how-it-works-nontechnical)

## Mechanics and controls
- [Architecture overview](https://docs.attn.markets/mechanics/architecture-overview)
- [Revenue accounts and signing model](https://docs.attn.markets/mechanics/revenue-accounts-and-signing-model)
- [attnCredit engine and attnUSD](https://docs.attn.markets/mechanics/pt-yt-attnusd)
- [Risk, limits, and concentration framework](https://docs.attn.markets/mechanics/risk-and-limits)
- [Pricing, spreads, and core parameters](https://docs.attn.markets/mechanics/pricing-and-parameters)

## Who this is for
- [Who attn is for](https://docs.attn.markets/introduction/who-attn-is-for)
- [Apps, DAOs, and builders](https://docs.attn.markets/users/for-apps-daos-and-builders)
- [Creators, devs, and memecoin CTOs](https://docs.attn.markets/users/for-creators-devs-and-ctos)
- [Launchpads and incubators](https://docs.attn.markets/users/for-launchpads-and-incubators)
- [Liquidity providers](https://docs.attn.markets/users/for-liquidity-providers)
- [Cards, commerce, and settlement partners](https://docs.attn.markets/users/for-cards-and-commerce-partners)

- [Tokenomics](https://docs.attn.markets/tokenomics/tokenomics-overview)
